header.title: IKVM.NET Stub Generator (ikvmstub.exe)
header.abstract: The ikvmstub tool generates Java stubs from .NET assemblies.

dl.dd: Name of an assembly. May be a fully-qualified path.

section.title: Notes
section.p: ikvmstub reads the specified assembly and generates a Java jar file containing Java interfaces and stub classes. For more information about the generated stubs, see the Developer's Guide.
The tool uses the following algorithm to locate the assembly:

ol.li: First it attempts to load the assembly from the default load context of ikvmstub.exe. For practical purposes, this usually means it searches the Global Assembly Cache.
If not found in the default load context, ikvmstub looks for the assembly at the indicated path (or the current directory, if no path is supplied).

section.title: Examples
section.p: Generates mscorlib.jar, containing stubs for classes, interfaces, etc., defined in mscorlib.dll.
Generates mylib.jar, containing stubs for classes, interfaces, etc., defined in c:\lib\mylib.dll.
